name: Universal Quiz
description:
In Development

I work hard to make the game bigger, more fun and more challenging.

10 unique questions

10 questions does not make the game largest on the markets, but I add more questions on the In Development stage.

Points System

Every correct answer gives you +1 point and wrong answer -1 points.

Save & Load Functions

Save and load functions available.

Everyone can play

Game is perfect for all ages thanks to great entertainment and educational content. 

PC, Mac, Android and Browser

You can download the game for PC, Mac, Android and Browser. Also iPhone/iPad version is possible us to create, but that is not currently in Itch.io:s category. On the main game (PC/Mac) price you also get access to Android and Browser versions. Android and Browser versions have not yet been fully tested to all screen resolutions.
